mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore with his family and staffers
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. with his family and staff. Moore and his wife are seated in the first row. Their daughters Shelley and Lucy are the first two people standing in the second row, left side. Arch III (Kim) is standing in the second row, first on the right side.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Capito, Shelley Moore, 1953
